name: Shrek Vs Shaggy: Battle of the Century
name_original: Shrek Vs Shaggy: Battle of the Century
description: This game is the most detailed game ever made in the history of games, it was made in the middle of shrek's swamp will Shaggy was beating up Thanos using 0.01% of his power. With all these conditions and my expertise in game development, I managed to make the ULTIMATE FIGHTING GAME!!!!
